projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-16 11.45.04 - Illustration of a modern employee management system software's main dashboard. It has a clean and user-friendly design with tabs labeled 'Employee Dir.png
projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.bodyText:
This program encompasses a range of functionalities, each designed to enhance user management and payroll processing. Notable features include:

- **_User Authentication_**:
   - Log in using a **_username_** and **_password_**
   - Securely store passwords with **_SHA-256 encryption_**

- **_Employee Management_**:
   - Perform actions such as **_addition_**, **_deletion_**, and **_modification_** of employee records

- **_Shift Scheduling_**:
   - Generate shift schedules based on user-defined parameters

- **_Payroll Processing_**:
   - Generate **_PDF pay slips_** for selected employees, streamlining payroll management

- **_Tax Deduction_**:
   - Calculate and deduct taxes according to user-configured **_tax rates_**

projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-16 14.16.43 - Illustration of a chat app interface made with Python and Flask. The design showcases a modern messaging layout with chat bubbles, user avatars, and a.png
projects.title: Pacific Chat
projects.bodyText:
- **Real-Time Messaging:** Communicate instantly with friends, family, or teammates.
- *User Authentication:* Securely join chat rooms with a unique username.
- **Create & Join Rooms:** Easily create rooms and invite others, or join existing ones using room IDs.
- *Customizable UI:* Enjoy a user-friendly interface with a dark theme for easy readability.
- **Privacy-Focused:** Your messages are not stored, ensuring privacy and confidentiality.
- *Fast & Efficient:* Built with performance and speed in mind for a seamless experience.
- **Create a Room:** Click on 'Create a Room' and enter your username to start chatting.
- *Join a Room:* Enter a room ID and your username to join existing chat rooms.
- **Send Messages:** Type your messages and press enter to send them in real-time.
- *Leave Room:* Click on 'Leave Room' whenever you want to exit the chat.

projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-28 08.52.32 - Photo of a modern waste sorting facility with advanced robots using AI to sort waste. Robots' arms are picking up items from a conveyor belt and placi.png
projects.title: Waste Classification Machine Learning Model
projects.bodyText:
- **Frameworks:** Utilized **_TensorFlow_** and **_Keras_** for constructing and training the deep learning model.

- **Algorithm:** Employed a **_Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)_** for extracting and learning features from waste images.

- **Optimizations:**
  - Incorporated **_Batch Normalization_** to stabilize activations.
  - Used **_Dropout_** layers to prevent overfitting.
  - Selected **_Adam_** as the optimizer for efficient weight updates during training.

 
 - **Web Interface:** Developed a user-friendly web interface powered by **_Flask_**.

- **Feedback Mechanism:** Integrated a dynamic pseudo-console for real-time feedback during image classification.

- **Model Performance:** Achieved a training accuracy of **_92.23%_** and a test accuracy peak of **_93.27%_**.

- **Data Handling:** Leveraged **_Data Augmentation_** techniques such as rotations, zooming, and horizontal flipping to enhance model generalization.

projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-16 11.40.08 - Illustration of a split screen. On the left side, there's a detailed depiction of charged particles interacting with a semiconductor, with arrows indi.png
projects.title: Research Paper : Causation of Bit Flips
projects.bodyText:
This research on **_Single Event Upsets (SEUs)_** includes:

- **Introduction**
- **Interdisciplinary Approach**
  - **Physics Factors**
  - **Computer Science Factors**
- **Historical Background**
- Real-world **SEU Incidents**
- **Moore’s Law**
- Understanding **Single Event Effects** and **Soft Errors**
- Role of **Physics**
  - Sources of Radiation
  - **Coulomb’s Law**
- **Prevention Methods**
  - **Shielding**
  - **Modular Redundancy**
  - **Error Correction Codes (ECCs)**
- **Evaluation of Methods**
- **Conclusion**
- **Bibliography**

projects.image: images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-16 11.37.08 - Photo of an old mathematician's desk. Papers are spread out, one of which shows a graph of Benford’s Law distribution with the first digit '1' being d.png
projects.title: Research : Benford's Law - Statistical Analysis
projects.bodyText:
This research covers the following key aspects:

- Exploration of ***Benford's Law***
- *Historical background*
- Objectives and variables
- **_Pearson's χ² test_** and *critical values*
- Analysis of **_COVID-19 data**
- Examination of randomly generated data in _Java_
- Evaluation of the *Kolmogorov-Smirnov test*
- Application of ***Benford's Law*** in fraud detection
- Limitations and misinterpretations
- Conclusion and validity assessment

projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-16 11.29.32 - Photo taken in a physics lab showing the detailed setup of the experiment. A plastic cylinder wrapped with copper wire is connected to a multimeter. A.png
projects.title: Laboratory report : Physics - Induced current based on the number of turns of copper
projects.bodyText:
In this study, we explore the following scientific aspects:

- Investigation of **_Electromagnetic Induction_** and its foundational principles based on Michael Faraday's work in the 1830s.

- Exploration of the intricate relationship between the number of turns in a copper coil and the resulting **induced current**.

- Examination of the phenomenon through the lens of **Faraday's Law**, which governs electromagnetic induction.

- Observing how changes in the coil's configuration affect the **Faraday's Law**-guided process as a neodymium magnet moves through the coil at a consistent velocity.

- Inspiration drawn from real-world applications, including generators and particle accelerators like CERN, which rely heavily on the principles of electromagnetic induction.

projects.image: ./images/projects/DALL·E 2023-10-17 15.45.09 - Photo of a large interactive touchscreen displaying a vibrant world map. Icons of landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Great Wall of China, and Pyramids o.png
projects.title: Interactive World Map
projects.bodyText:
**Interactive Visualization:** Display an interactive world map with data visualization using the **svgMap** JavaScript library.
- *Custom Data:* Users can hover over countries to view customized data such as GDP per capita and its change from the previous year.
- **Easy Integration:** The map is easily integrated into web pages, offering a seamless user experience.
- *Scalability:* Though only data for a few countries is showcased to keep the example concise, the implementation is scalable to include data for all countries.
- **Customization Options:** Adjust colors, tooltips, and other elements to fit various use cases and aesthetics.
